_readyActive.Title: /Bag/State/readyActive
_readyActive.Description: Code whether mode group is ready

_resetActive.Title: /Bag/State/resetActive
_resetActive.Description: Code whether all channels in mode group are in Reset

_cycleTime.Title: /Channel/ChannelDiagnose/cycleTime
_cycleTime.Description: Runtime of selected NC program ( in seconds ):

_acIpoBuf.Title: /Channel/ChannelDiagnose/acIpoBuf
_acIpoBuf.Description: Level of IPO buffer (number of blocks)

_operatingTime.Title: /Channel/ChannelDiagnose/operatingTime
_operatingTime.Description: Total runtime of NC programs in Automatic mode

_sumCycleTimeNet.Title: /Channel/ChannelDiagnose/sumCycleTimeNet
_sumCycleTimeNet.Description: Sum of net run times in ms

_maskToolManagement.Title: /Channel/Configuration/maskToolManagement

_numActAxes.Title: /Channel/Configuration/numActAxes
_numActAxes.Description: Number of active tools in channel.

_numBasisFrames.Title: /Channel/Configuration/numBasisFrames
_numBasisFrames.Description: Number of basic frames in channel

_numGeoAxes.Title: /Channel/Configuration/numGeoAxes
_numGeoAxes.Description: Number of geometry axes and orientation axes

_numToolEdges.Title: /Channel/Configuration/numToolEdges
_numToolEdges.Description: Number of tool edges in this channel

_numUserFrames.Title: /Channel/Configuration/numUserFrames
_numUserFrames.Description: Number of user frames in this channel

_actLineNumber.Title: /Channel/ProgramInfo/actLineNumber
_actLineNumber.Description: Line number of the current NC instruction (starting at 1)

_actPartProgram.Title: /Channel/ProgramInfo/actPartProgram

_workPandProgName.Title: /Channel/ProgramInfo/workPandProgName

_alarmNo.Title: /Nck/SequencedAlarms/alarmNo

_toolInPlace.Title: /Tool/Catalogue/toolInPlace
_toolInPlace.Description: Current location in which the tool is located

_CompTransfor.Title: /Tool/CompTransfor

_siemEdgeData.Description: Siemens application tool cutting edge parameter

_adaptNo.Title: /Tool/Data/adaptNo
_adaptNo.Description: Number of adapter defined by system parameter $TC_ADPx which is

_numCuttEdges.Title: /Tool/Data/numCuttEdges
_numCuttEdges.Description: Number of cutting edges of a tool

_toolInMag.Title: /Tool/Data/toolInMag
_toolInMag.Description: Current magazine in which the tool is located

_toolInPlace.Title: /Tool/Data/toolInPlace
_toolInPlace.Description: Current location in which the tool is located

_toolMaxAcc.Title: /Tool/Data/toolMaxAcc
_toolMaxAcc.Description: Maximum angular acceleration of the tool if the value is >0. There is no monitoring if no acceleration limit is defined (=0).

_toolMaxVelo.Title: /Tool/Data/toolMaxVelo
_toolMaxVelo.Description: Maximum speed of the tool if the value is >0. There is no monitoring if no speed limit is defined (=0).

_toolMyMag.Title: /Tool/Data/toolMyMag
_toolMyMag.Description: Owner magazine of the tool magazine from which the tool was loaded

_toolMyPlace.Title: /Tool/Data/toolMyPlace
_toolMyPlace.Description: Owner magazine of the tool - Magazine location from which the tool was

_toolSearch.Title: /Tool/Data/toolSearch
_toolSearch.Description: Type of tool search for replacement tools

_toolsize_left.Title: /Tool/Data/toolsize_left
_toolsize_left.Description: Size to the left in half locations

_toolsize_right.Title: /Tool/Data/toolsize_right
_toolsize_right.Description: Size to the right in half locations

_Find.Title: /Tool/Find
_Find.Description: Used as parameter and return value of the PI-Services _N_TMGETT and _N_TSEARC

_parDataTAD.Title: /Tool/Find/parDataTAD
_parDataTAD.Description: Parameterizing: For parameters with data type DOUBLE of the module TAD a value can be stored as a comparison value for a 'complex search' (_N_TSEARC).

_parDataTAO.Title: /Tool/Find/parDataTAO
_parDataTAO.Description: Parameterizing: For parameters with data type DOUBLE of the module TAO a value can be stored as a comparison value for a 'complex search' (_N_TSEARC).

_parDataTAS.Title: /Tool/Find/parDataTAS
_parDataTAS.Description: Parameterizing: For parameters with data type DOUBLE of the module TAS a value can be stored as a comparison value for a 'complex search' (_N_TSEARC).

_parDataTD.Title: /Tool/Find/parDataTD
_parDataTD.Description: Parameterizing: For parameters with data type UWORD of the module TD a value can be stored as a comparison value for a 'complex search' (_N_TSEARC).

_parDataTO.Title: /Tool/Find/parDataTO
_parDataTO.Description: Parameterizing: For each parameter of the module TO, a value can be stored as a comparison value for the 'complex search' (_N_TSEARC).

_parDataTS.Title: /Tool/Find/parDataTS
_parDataTS.Description: Parameterizing: For each parameter of the module TS a value can be stored as a comparison value for a 'complex search' (_N_TSEARC).

_parDataTU.Title: /Tool/Find/parDataTU
_parDataTU.Description: Parameterizing: For each parameter of the module TU a value can be stored as a comparison value for a 'complex search' (_N_TSEARC).

_parDataTUE.Title: /Tool/Find/parDataTUE

_parDataTUS.Title: /Tool/Find/parDataTUS

_parDataToolDuploNo.Title: /Tool/Find/parDataToolDuploNo
_parDataToolDuploNo.Description: Parameterizing: For parameters with data type UWORD of the module TD a value can be stored as a comparison value for a 'complex search' (_N_TSEARC).

_parDataToolIdentTD.Title: /Tool/Find/parDataToolIdentTD
_parDataToolIdentTD.Description: Parameterizing: For the parameter with data type string[32] (tool identifier) of the module TD a value can be stored as a comparison value for a 'complex search' (_N_TSEARC).

_parDataToolNumCuttEdges.Description: Parameterizing: For parameters with data type UWORD of the module TD a value can be stored as a comparison value for a 'complex search' (_N_TSEARC).

_parDataToolToolInMag.Description: Parameterizing: For parameters with data type UWORD of the module TD a value can be stored as a comparison value for a 'complex search' (_N_TSEARC).

_parDataToolToolInPlace.Title: /Tool/Find/parDataToolToolInPlace
_parDataToolToolInPlace.Description: Parameterizing: For parameters with data type UWORD of the module TD a value can be stored as a comparison value for a 'complex search' (_N_TSEARC).

_parDataToolToolInfo.Title: /Tool/Find/parDataToolToolInfo
_parDataToolToolInfo.Description: Parameterizing: For parameters with data type UWORD of the module TD a value can be stored as a comparison value for a 'complex search' (_N_TSEARC).

_parDataToolToolMon.Title: /Tool/Find/parDataToolToolMon
_parDataToolToolMon.Description: Parameterizing: For parameters with data type UWORD of the module TD a value can be stored as a comparison value for a 'complex search' (_N_TSEARC).

_parDataToolToolSearch.Title: /Tool/Find/parDataToolToolSearch
_parDataToolToolSearch.Description: Parameterizing: For parameters with data type UWORD of the module TD a value can be stored as a comparison value for a 'complex search' (_N_TSEARC).

_parDataToolToolState.Title: /Tool/Find/parDataToolToolState
_parDataToolToolState.Description: Parameterizing: For parameters with data type UWORD of the module TD a value can be stored as a comparison value for a 'complex search' (_N_TSEARC).

_parDataToolToolplace_spec.Title: /Tool/Find/parDataToolToolplace_spec
_parDataToolToolplace_spec.Description: Parameterizing: For parameters with data type UWORD of the module TD a value can be stored as a comparison value for a 'complex search' (_N_TSEARC).

_parDataToolToolsize_down.Title: /Tool/Find/parDataToolToolsize_down
_parDataToolToolsize_down.Description: Parameterizing: For parameters with data type UWORD of the module TD a value can be stored as a comparison value for a 'complex search' (_N_TSEARC).

_parDataToolToolsize_left.Title: /Tool/Find/parDataToolToolsize_left
_parDataToolToolsize_left.Description: Parameterizing: For parameters with data type UWORD of the module TD a value can be stored as a comparison value for a 'complex search' (_N_TSEARC).

_parDataToolToolsize_right.Title: /Tool/Find/parDataToolToolsize_right
_parDataToolToolsize_right.Description: Parameterizing: For parameters with data type UWORD of the module TD a value can be stored as a comparison value for a 'complex search' (_N_TSEARC).

_parDataToolToolsize_upper.Description: Parameterizing: For parameters with data type UWORD of the module TD a value can be stored as a comparison value for a 'complex search' (_N_TSEARC).

_parMasksTAD.Title: /Tool/Find/parMasksTAD
_parMasksTAD.Description: Parameterizing: There is a mask for each parameter of the module TAD that indicates whether it is to serve as a search criterion for a 'complex search' (_N_TSEARC) and how it is to be combined.

_parMasksTAO.Title: /Tool/Find/parMasksTAO
_parMasksTAO.Description: Parameterizing: There is a mask for each parameter of the module TAO that indicates whether it is to serve as a search criterion for a 'complex search' (_N_TSEARC) and how it is to be combined.

_parMasksTAS.Title: /Tool/Find/parMasksTAS
_parMasksTAS.Description: Parameterizing: There is a mask for each parameter of the module TAS that indicates whether it is to serve as a search criterion for a 'complex search' (_N_TSEARC) and how it is to be combined.

_parMasksTD.Title: /Tool/Find/parMasksTD
_parMasksTD.Description: Parameterizing: There is a mask for each parameter of the module TD that indicates whether it is to serve as a search criterion for a 'complex search' (_N_TSEARC) and how it is to be combined.

_parMasksTO.Title: /Tool/Find/parMasksTO
_parMasksTO.Description: Parameterizing: There is a mask for each parameter of the module TO

_parMasksTS.Title: /Tool/Find/parMasksTS
_parMasksTS.Description: Parameterizing: There is a mask for each parameter of the module TS

_parMasksTU.Title: /Tool/Find/parMasksTU
_parMasksTU.Description: Parameterizing: There is a mask for each parameter of the module TU

_parMasksTUE.Title: /Tool/Find/parMasksTUE
_parMasksTUE.Description: Parameterizing: There is a mask for each parameter of the module TUE

_parMasksTUS.Title: /Tool/Find/parMasksTUS
_parMasksTUS.Description: Parameterizing: There is a mask for each parameter of the module TUS that indicates whether it is to serve as a search criterion for a 'complex search' (_N_TUSEARC) and how it is to be combined.

_resultCuttingEdgeNrUsed.Title: /Tool/Find/resultCuttingEdgeNrUsed
_resultCuttingEdgeNrUsed.Description: D numbers of the cutting edges used since the last workpiece count, that have previously been used on the defined tool carrier via $$resultNrOfCutEdgesUsed.

_resultToolNr.Title: /Tool/Find/resultToolNr
_resultToolNr.Description: Result: T-numbers of the tools found

_resultToolNrUsed.Title: /Tool/Find/resultToolNrUsed
_resultToolNrUsed.Description: T numbers of the cutting edges used since the last workpiece count, that have previously been used on the defined tool carrier via $$resultNrOfCutEdgesUsed.

_actToolWide.Title: /Tool/GrindingData/actToolWide
_actToolWide.Description: Current width of the grinding wheel

_conntectPar.Title: /Tool/GrindingData/conntectPar
_conntectPar.Description: Chaining rule. This parameter ( which is bitwise defined ) specifies which tool parameters of cutting edge 2 and cutting edge 1 are chained. If the value of any chained parameter is altered, the value of the other chained parameter is automatically adapted.

_inclAngle.Title: /Tool/GrindingData/inclAngle
_inclAngle.Description: Angle of inclination of the inclined grinding wheel in the current plane

_maxRotSpeed.Title: /Tool/GrindingData/maxRotSpeed
_maxRotSpeed.Description: Maximum rotary speed of the grinding wheel

_maxTipSpeed.Title: /Tool/GrindingData/maxTipSpeed
_maxTipSpeed.Description: Maximum peripheral speed of the grinding wheel

_minToolDia.Title: /Tool/GrindingData/minToolDia
_minToolDia.Description: Minimum diameter of the grinding wheel

_minToolWide.Title: /Tool/GrindingData/minToolWide
_minToolWide.Description: Minimum width of the grinding wheel

_paramNrCCV.Title: /Tool/GrindingData/paramNrCCV
_paramNrCCV.Description: Compensation parameters for the function SUG ("constant perimeter speed of grinding wheel"). These parameters define which compensation value is to be used for SUG, tool monitoring and centerless grinding. The value always refers to cutting edge D1.

_spinNoDress.Title: /Tool/GrindingData/spinNoDress
_spinNoDress.Description: Spindle number to which the monitoring data and the function SUG ("constant perimeter speed of grinding wheel") refer.

_isoCorrParam.Title: /Tool/IsoHDCompensation/isoCorrParam
_isoCorrParam.Description: This variable contains the offset values for the ISO2.2 and ISO3.2 modes.

_multitoolInMag.Description: Number of the magazine on which the multi-tool is located

_multitoolInPlace.Title: /Tool/MT/multitoolInPlace
_multitoolInPlace.Description: Number of the magazine place at which the multi-tool is located

_multitoolMyMag.Title: /Tool/MT/multitoolMyMag
_multitoolMyMag.Description: Owner magazine of the tool magazine from which the MT was loaded

_multitoolMyPlace.Title: /Tool/MT/multitoolMyPlace
_multitoolMyPlace.Description: Owner magazine place of the MT - magazine place from which the multi-tool

_multitoolPosition.Title: /Tool/MT/multitoolPosition
_multitoolPosition.Description: MT position (number of the MT place)

_multitoolStateL.Title: /Tool/MT/multitoolStateL

_MTnumWZV.Description: Number of the last multi-tool to be created

_multitoolInMag.Description: Number of the magazine on which the multi-tool is located

_multitoolInPlace.Title: /Tool/MTCatalogue/multitoolInPlace
_multitoolInPlace.Description: Number of the magazine place at which the multi-tool is located

_multitoolNo.Title: /Tool/MTCatalogue/multitoolNo
_multitoolNo.Description: Number of the multi-tool. Array access to the column multitoolNo is

_numLocations.Title: /Tool/MTCatalogue/numLocations
_numLocations.Description: Number of places in the multi-tool

_userPlaceData.Description: Multi-tool place user data. These parameters can only be used if the machine data $MN_MM_NUM_CC_MTLOC_PARAM and $MN_MM_TOOL_MANAGEMENT_MASK have been set accordingly.

_multiPlace.Title: /Tool/Magazine/multiPlace
_multiPlace.Description: P1: Distance between the change position of magazine n and the location m of the first internal magazine (loading magazine, 9999) ($TC_MDP1)

_userPlaceData.Title: /Tool/Magazine/userPlaceData
_userPlaceData.Description: Magazine location user data for a tool magazine. These parameters can only be used if the machine data

_userPlaceDataDouble.Description: Magazine location user data for a tool magazine. These parameters can only be used if the machine data

_numActMags.Description: Number of magazines in the modules TMV and TM

_magBLMag.Title: /Tool/MagazineConfiguration/magBLMag
_magBLMag.Description: Number of the internal load magazine

_magCBCmdState.Title: /Tool/MagazineConfiguration/magCBCmdState
_magCBCmdState.Description: Command state of the magazine (for magCBCmd)

_magCMCmdPar1.Title: /Tool/MagazineConfiguration/magCMCmdPar1
_magCMCmdPar1.Description: Return variable for the command MagCBCmd

_magCMCmdPar2.Title: /Tool/MagazineConfiguration/magCMCmdPar2

_magRPlaces.Title: /Tool/MagazineConfiguration/magRPlaces
_magRPlaces.Description: Total number of real magazine locations (incl. buffer and loading locations)

_magSearch.Title: /Tool/MagazineConfiguration/magSearch
_magSearch.Description: Type of tool search. This variable is bitwise defined.

_magVPlaces.Title: /Tool/MagazineConfiguration/magVPlaces
_magVPlaces.Description: Number of defined locations for the control block

_modeWearGroup.Title: /Tool/MagazineConfiguration/modeWearGroup
_modeWearGroup.Description: Definition of strategies relating to wear group.

_magDim.Title: /Tool/MagazineDescription/magDim
_magDim.Description: Dimension of the magazine, number of magazine lines in the box magazine

_magDim2.Title: /Tool/MagazineDescription/magDim2
_magDim2.Description: Dimension of the magazine, number of columns in the box magazine

_magLink1.Title: /Tool/MagazineDescription/magLink1
_magLink1.Description: Chaining 1 of the magazine to the following magazine. Number to (next) background magazine. Can be used with chain, revolver and box magazines (magKind = 1,3 or 5)

_magLink2.Title: /Tool/MagazineDescription/magLink2
_magLink2.Description: Chaining 2 of the magazine to the previous magazine. Backward chaining of background magazines. Can be used for chaining to chain, revolver and box magazines (magKind = 1, 3 or 5)

_magNrPlaces.Title: /Tool/MagazineDescription/magNrPlaces
_magNrPlaces.Description: Number of real locations (in chain magazine) or number of slots (in box magazine)

_magPlaceUserDataNumLimit.Title: /Tool/MagazineDescription/magPlaceUserDataNumLimit

_magToolSearchStrat.Title: /Tool/MagazineDescription/magToolSearchStrat
_magToolSearchStrat.Description: Tool search strategy during tool change

_magWearCompoundNo.Title: /Tool/MagazineDescription/magWearCompoundNo
_magWearCompoundNo.Description: Each magazine has its own active wear group (wear group number).

_userData.Title: /Tool/MagazineDescription/userData
_userData.Description: Magazine user data for a tool magazine. These parameters can only be used if the machine data

_userDataDouble.Title: /Tool/MagazineDescription/userDataDouble
_userDataDouble.Description: Magazine user data for a tool magazine. These parameters can only be used if the machine data

_applData.Title: /Tool/Supervision/applData
_applData.Description: Siemens application monitoring data of a tool cutting edge.

_data.Title: /Tool/Supervision/data

_dummy.Title: /Tool/Supervision/dummy

_siemData.Title: /Tool/Supervision/siemData
_siemData.Description: Siemens application monitoring data of a tool cutting edge.

_userData.Title: /Tool/Supervision/userData
_userData.Description: User data for monitoring a cutting edge. These parameters can only be used if the machine data $MN_MM_NUM_CC_MON_PARAM and $MN_MM_TOOL_MANAGEMENT_MASK have been set accordingly.

_tcCarr6.Description: z component of offset vector l2

_tcCarr60.Title: /Tool/ToolCarrier/tcCarr60
_tcCarr60.Description: z-component of the fine offset of the offset vector l4

_tcCarr64.Title: /Tool/ToolCarrier/tcCarr64
_tcCarr64.Description: Fine offset of the offset of the rotary axis v1

_tcCarr65.Title: /Tool/ToolCarrier/tcCarr65
_tcCarr65.Description: Fine offset of the offset of the rotary axis v2

_tcCarr7.Title: /Tool/ToolCarrier/tcCarr7
_tcCarr7.Description: x component of rotary axis v1

_tcCarr8.Title: /Tool/ToolCarrier/tcCarr8
_tcCarr8.Description: y component of rotary axis v1

_tcCarr9.Title: /Tool/ToolCarrier/tcCarr9
_tcCarr9.Description: z component of rotary axis v1

_Tools.Title: /Tool/Tools
_Tools.Description: Tool parameters of the Siemens application

_data.Title: /Tool/User/data
_data.Description: User-defined tool parameter. Important: This is a two-dimensional variable, the column index is the parameter number

_edgeData.Title: /Tool/User/edgeData
_edgeData.Description: User-defined cutting edge parameter. Important: This is a two-dimensional variable, the column index is the T number
